participant_1.name: Marcus
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and introspective, Marcus is determined to forge a better life for himself while staying true to his roots.
participant_1.background: I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways. I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone. I have created my own personal religion. My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating. My favorite artist is 2pac.

participant_2.name: Jasmine
participant_2.personality: Creative and emotional, Jasmine expresses herself through music and yearns for deeper connections with others.
participant_2.background: My Impala is the only thing I have to show for my life. I am a musician. I love taking care of my curls. I'm sad because my best friend just moved away. I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.

content.text: Same here. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music and explore new places.
That's cool. I like to play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play the piano and sing.
Nice! I play the guitar and sing too. What are some of your favorite songs?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into 90s hip hop right now.
Oh nice! I like some 90s hip hop too. Who are some of your favorite artists?
Tupac, Biggie, Nas, and Outkast are my favorites.
Those are all great artists! I love Tupac and Biggie. Have you ever been to Japan?
No, I've never been to Japan. I've always wanted to go though. Have you been?
Yeah, I went a few years ago. It was amazing! I loved the food and the culture.
That's awesome! I'm jealous. I've heard that the food is amazing there.
It is! You have to try the ramen and sushi.
I will definitely have to try those if I ever go to Japan.
You should! It's a great place to visit.
